text: @afneil @SakrRuth I’m smelling right wing bull💩 Didn't ’US intelligence’ lead to the illegal Iraq war and the illegal bombing of Syria? Why  are you so eager to post this negative rubbish about China,  but reluctant to post anything positive, until corroborated? #dogwhistle #COVID19
